about_the_game:
When our gods hear no prayer, only bullets are the answer. Join the crusade against aliens as one of the Gunsaders of the Church. Team up with friends online and embark on holy missions to fend off the frantic hordes of cosmic horror, inspired by Lovecraft mythos. Burn the sinners. Extract the human-oil. And prove your faith to the Church Of Humanity.

The mysterious bullet shaped objects were found all over the world by various religious groups, granting them knowledge beyond their time. Such events propelled humanity into the age of industrial technology, controlled absolutely by the religious organizations, and quickly spurred the flame of crusade and expansion in the name of their gods.

But the greatest threat lies in shadow, beyond the farthest stars. Unknown powers, alien to our world, had already seeped across the lands and formed their own cults. The invasion of the Outer Gods put their petty conflicts to a sudden stop, and all barrels turned towards their common enemies. Thus, erected the Church of Humanity, the one true faith above all, the one of oil, steel and gunpowder. The battle of influence between earth and stars begins here. May the Bullet lead us to yellow light.

After a long history of bloody inquisition, The Church of Humanity successfully united servants of faith from all over the world under their iron wings to stand against the outworld threat together. And those who enact the will of the Bullet are known as the ‘Gunsaders’.

SISTER LILITH

The Gunsader of the Sanguine Dogma who wields hand-cannon (literally) as her weapon. Sister Lilith was an orphan raised by the blood cult who believes in strength gained by devouring life, and execution must be done by hand.This creed of red sisters is considered the most violent branch of the Church.

BROTHER VARUN JIWORNBAA KAHMAITAI

The eastern branch of the Church is generally seen as the more peaceful folks, they only serve as deacons, and rarely in the front line. But Brother Varun believes that true peace can only be achieved by annihilation of their enemies. With double shotguns and a rifle by his side, he preaches the best way he knows how.


FATHER PIERO

Father Piero claims he was once chosen by cardinals to hold the title of pontiff before the old faith was replaced by the Church of Humanity. He was one of a few survivors from the first invasion of Outer Gods, making him one of the longest serving Gunsaders to date. Father Piero built his gun-throne as a remembrance of the honor he once received from the bygone era, and never leaves it even amidst the battlefield.

SISTER KAMARA

As a shaman of the Pyre, Sister Kamara came from the flame worshiping dogma that believes death by fire is the holiest send off of souls. Her tribe, despite being small, holds the largest source of human-oil, of which they submit to the Church as offerings. She wields a flame-saw that can ignite the battlefield and bring light of the Church to the front line.


A perfect blend of seriousness and comedy, in stylized “vibrant dieselpunk” world mixed with a dash of Lovecraftian.

  • Wield Divine Punishment as the ultimate skill unique to each character. Use it to turn the tide of the battle!

  • Summon a massive ‘Totem’ to descend upon the battlefield, providing buffs, and causing chaos!.

  • Brave the darkness in nightfall missions where the true terror begins!

  • Find stories left behind by the dead, piece together clues. You may yet to uncover the truth about the Church

There are 4 types of crusades you may embark on, for the glory of the Church:

  • Guide the Lost Souls

    • Guide the Lost Souls: Lead the sinners on their sacred pilgrimage to cleanse their souls and offer tribute to the gods. Ensure their journey is one of redemption and spiritual growth. Your role is vital in helping them find solace… in flame.

  • Purify the Elder Brain

    • Purify the Elder Brain: Fortify the ritual site and protect the priests from Outer God’s monstrous army during the rite of cleansing. Your vigilance is crucial to preventing their invasion and strengthening the influence of the Church.

  • Excavate the Human-Oil

    • Excavate the Human-Oil: Collect vital resources to restore the divine engine and excavate the Human-Oil beneath the earth. Your efforts will ensure that no fallen comrades died in vain, their fossil fuel shall become life-blood for the Church’s glory.

  • Extraction

    • Extraction: Defend the area until the chapel rocket is ready. Stand your ground and finish your crusade. Return to the Church with all comrades intact, or leave them to die a lonely death.

Various sorts of madness await you in the crusade. There is no telling what kind of monstrosity can be born from the wretches who worship the Outer Gods with their profane, outlandish rituals. Or maybe, it is something in your mind that warps reality beyond senses. Has the world gone crazy, or have you, the one who gives blind faith to the ‘Church’?

name: Father, Son & Holy Guns

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 4GB Ram

short_description: A fast-paced, top-down action game set in a stylized Dieselpunk world.
